headline.main: DONETS IS IN PERIL; Nazis Say Two Russian Centers in Basin Fell to Increased Push 'SERIOUS,' SAYS MOSCOW Fate of Much of Southern Front Hangs on Outcome of Battle of Great Violence DONETS IS IN PERIL OF A NAZI WEDGE

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Feb. 28 -- The battle in the northwest region of the Donets Basin, which for prolonged violence surpasses any fought in Southern Russia since that at Kotelnikov, is still in progress and the issue still hangs in the balance.
abstract: USSR repts Ger counter-attacks, Donets Basin; repts advance west of Kharkov and Kursk; Gers rept recapture of Kramatorsk and Lozovaya; map
snippet: MOSCOW, Feb. 28 -- The battle in the northwest region of the Donets Basin, which for prolonged violence surpasses any fought in Southern Russia since that at Kotelnikov, is still in progress and the issue still hangs in the balance....

byline.original: By RALPH PARKERSpecial Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
